WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Thanks for the suggestion.  We'll look into this when we design our project/build system fully.  Right now the limitations are an artifact of being a very early release, but we do plan to to improve in these areas.

Closing this 'issue' now as this is just work we haven't got to yet, not an issue with the work we have done.

Thanks!
WorkItem.Description: Why not use for *.ts the same mechanism used for compiling *.ascx and *.aspx to DLLs? AFAIK there is a whole infrastructure of "build providers" that can be utilized for this purpose.
